scripts.test:chromium: cross-env BROWSER=chromium cucumber-js features/**/*.feature --require features/step-defination/**/*.js --require support/**/*.js --format json:reports/json/chromium.json
scripts.test:firefox: cross-env BROWSER=firefox cucumber-js features/**/*.feature --require features/step-defination/**/*.js --require support/**/*.js --format json:reports/json/firefox.json
scripts.test:webkit: cross-env BROWSER=webkit cucumber-js features/**/*.feature --require features/step-defination/**/*.js --require support/**/*.js --format json:reports/json/webkit.json
scripts.test:exceptions: cross-env BROWSER=chromium cucumber-js features/exceptions/**/*.feature --require features/step-definitions/**/*.js --require support/**/*.js --format json:reports/json/exceptions.json
scripts.test:login: cross-env BROWSER=chromium cucumber-js features/login/**/*.feature --require features/step-definitions/**/*.js --require support/**/*.js --format json:reports/json/login.json
scripts.test:table: cross-env BROWSER=chromium cucumber-js features/table/**/*.feature --require features/step-definitions/**/*.js --require support/**/*.js --format json:reports/json/table.json
scripts.test:all: concurrently "npm run test:chromium" "npm run test:firefox" "npm run test:webkit"
